This Privacy Policy outlines how
we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our
website and use our application.

Information We Collect

We collect information that you provide voluntarily when you register on our
site and use our services.

The categories of information we collect can
include:

### 2.1 Personal and Company Identification Information

When you register an account or use our services, we may collect the following
information:

  * Name
  * Email
  * Job title
  * Profile image
  * Timezone
  * Industry
  * Company name
  * Company size
  * Company address
  * Company phone number
  * Company email
  * Company logo

### 2.2 Client Information

To facilitate your use of our services, we may collect client details that can
include:

  * Client name
  * Client contact name
  * Client email
  * Client phone number
  * Client address

### 2.3 Team Members Information

If you invite team members to use our services, we may collect their
information which includes but is not limited to:

  * Name
  * Email
  * Job title
  * Billable rate/Salary

### 2.4 Invoice and Time Tracking Information

We collect details regarding the time logged using our services and the
details of the invoices you send, including:

  * Time logs
  * Invoice details

### 2.5 Analytics and Usage Information

We use Google Analytics and Hotjar to collect data about your usage of our
site and services.

This can include:

  * Browser type
  * Operating system
  * IP address
  * Actions performed on the app

## 3\.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  * Provide and maintain our services
  * Improve the usability of our services
  * Personalize your experience
  * Communicate with you
  * For analytics and performance monitoring

## 4\.

You have choices
regarding the information we collect and how it is used.

Children’s Privacy

Our services are not designed for children under 13, and we do not knowingly
collect information from children under 13.

If we learn we have collected or
received personal information from a child under 13, we will delete that
information.

Sharing Your Information

We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

However, we do
share your information with trusted third-party service providers to
facilitate various services on our behalf, including:

  * Stripe and PayPal: to facilitate subscription management and transactions between you and your clients.

We ensure that these third parties are contractually obligated to maintain the
confidentiality and security of your data, and they can only use the data to
the extent necessary to perform the services on our behalf.

We may also share aggregated or de-identified information, which cannot
reasonably be used to identify you, with other parties as we deem appropriate.
